storeshortdescription: Makes Newtab page edge aligned while center is empty
storelongdescription:
Edge Aligned Layout

This layout aligns all content of your Newtab page to the edges while keeping the center empty for a clean, sleek and spacious look.

Features

  • Pushes bookmarks, widgets, and other content to the top, bottom, and sides of the page.
  • Leaves the center free for a minimal, distraction-free experience.
  • Compatible with most plugins, but some layout modifiers may cause conflicts.

Customization

Bookmarks
Adjust the max bookmars and listing sequence:
set localstorage.MAX_BOOKMARKS = 6;
set localstorage.layoutPattern = 1,1,1,1,1,1;
Replace 6 & 1,1,1,1,1,1 with your preferred values to add more or reduce bookmark tiles.

Plugin Conflicts

You should turn off Limit Adjuster plugin to avoid layout conflicts.
